vote.title: To Celebrate Representative Joyce Beatty and Congratulate her on Receiving the 2023 B. Marie Clarke Community Service Award at the 34th Annual Labor Salute to Martin Luther King Jr. Awards Brunch
vote.description:
Title
 
To Celebrate Representative Joyce Beatty and Congratulate her on Receiving the 2023 B. Marie Clarke Community Service Award at the 34th Annual Labor Salute to Martin Luther King Jr. Awards Brunch
 
Body
WHEREAS, Joyce Beatty currently serves as the United States Representative for Ohio’s Third Congressional District, a role she has held since 2013; and 
WHEREAS, Rep. Beatty has been a stalwart advocate for Ohioan’s throughout her career, which has spanned from the Montgomery County Department of Health and Human Service to the Ohio House of Representatives to the U.S. House of Representatives; and
WHEREAS, as the daughter of a proud Union worker, Rep. Beatty’s career has been marked by a dedication to working people, including through sponsoring legislation to strengthen collective bargaining rights and to support workers during the COVID-19 pandemic; and 
 
WHEREAS, this award is one of many prestigious recognitions given to Rep. Beaty in appreciation of her undying support of her constituents of all backgrounds; now, therefore
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council celebrates Representative Joyce Beatty and congratulates her on receiving the 2023 B. Marie Clarke Community Service Award at the 34th Annual Labor Salute to Martin Luther King Jr. Awards Brunch
